info.s1products.server.device

クラス DeviceMessageSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.s1products.server.device.DeviceMessageSender
  • 直系の既知のサブクラス:
    MockDriver

    public abstract class DeviceMessageSender
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provided send message to device core functions. To implement own message sender, extend this abstract class.

    [ Feature list ]

    • Receive message from request router
    • Send message to device
    • Notify message sent event

    作成者:
    Shuichi Miura

      • isTargetMessage

        public abstract boolean isTargetMessage(Message message)
        Check specified message is target for this driver
        パラメータ:
        address - Address
        戻り値:
        True is target for me. False is not target for me.

      • onInitialize

        protected abstract boolean onInitialize(java.util.Properties prop)
        Initialize device driver
        パラメータ:
        prop - Settings for driver
        戻り値:
        True is success. False is fail.

      • onClose

        Closing device driver

        Receive message from router
        パラメータ:
        message - Any message
        戻り値:
        Processing result on driver
